name: nginx-proxy-manager
description: Nginx Proxy Manager is a self-hosted web UI for managing Nginx proxies with SSL support. It offers simple setup for reverse proxies, domain routing, and certificate generation via Let's Encrypt.
features: Reverse proxy management: Configure Nginx proxies through an intuitive web interface without editing config files.
SSL certificates: Automatic SSL certificate generation and renewal via Let's Encrypt.
Domain routing: Route multiple domains to different backend services from a single IP address.
Access lists: Restrict access to proxied services by IP address or authentication.
Custom locations: Define URL path-based routing to different backend services.
WebSocket support: Proxy WebSocket connections for real-time applications.
HTTP/2 and HTTP/3: Enable modern protocols for improved performance and security.
Force SSL: Automatically redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS for secure connections.
Custom Nginx config: Add advanced Nginx directives for specialized configurations.
Access logs: View and analyze proxy access logs for troubleshooting and monitoring.
User management: Create multiple admin users with different permission levels.
Backup and restore: Export and import proxy configurations for disaster recovery.
